name: pie
trans: 馅饼，派。A baked dish with a pastry crust, typically filled with fruit or meat.

name: tea
trans: 茶。A hot drink made by infusing dried leaves of the tea plant in boiling water.

name: tiger
trans: 老虎。A large wild cat with a yellow-orange coat with black stripes.

name: agile
trans: 敏捷的；灵活的。Quick and well-coordinated in movement or thought.

name: lizard
trans: 蜥蜴。A reptile with a long body and tail, typically having dry scaly skin.

name: sticks
trans: 棍，棒。Long, thin pieces of wood used for various purposes.

name: zebra
trans: 斑马。An African wild horse with black-and-white stripes.

name: playful
trans: 有趣的；顽皮的。Fond of games and amusement; lighthearted.

name: graceful
trans: 优雅的。Having elegance or beauty of movement, form, or manner.

name: hardworking
trans: 勤奋的。Diligent and industrious in one's efforts or work.

name: fox
trans: 狐狸。A carnivorous mammal with a bushy tail and reddish fur.

name: fast
trans: 快的。Moving or capable of moving at high speed.

name: busy
trans: 忙碌的。Actively engaged in work or occupied.

name: proud
trans: 骄傲的。Feeling deep pleasure or satisfaction from achievements.

name: kitten
trans: 小猫。A young domestic cat.

name: fierce
trans: 凶猛的。Having or displaying intense aggressiveness.

name: animals
trans: 动物。Living organisms that feed on organic matter.

name: monkey
trans: 猴子。A small to medium-sized primate with a tail.

name: popped
trans: 突然弹出。Suddenly burst or appeared.

name: cheetah
trans: 猎豹。A large spotted cat known for its speed.

name: bees
trans: 蜜蜂。Flying insects known for pollination and producing honey.

name: food
trans: 食物。Substances consumed to provide nutritional support.

name: giant
trans: 巨大的；巨人。Extremely large in size or power.

name: honey
trans: 蜂蜜。A sweet viscous substance produced by bees.

name: butter
trans: 黄油。A dairy product made by churning cream.

name: scared
trans: 害怕的。Feeling fear or anxiety.

name: bread
trans: 面包。A staple food made from flour and water, baked.

name: hungry
trans: 饥饿的。Having a desire or need for food.

name: beehive
trans: 蜂箱。A structure where bees live and store honey.

name: people
trans: 人们；人民。Human beings collectively or a community.

name: got
trans: 得到（get的过去式）。Received or obtained something.

name: ran
trans: 跑（run的过去式）。Moved rapidly on foot.

name: hit
trans: 击打。Struck with force.

name: took
trans: 拿取（take的过去式）。Picked up or carried something.

name: want
trans: 想要。Desire to possess or do something.

name: looked
trans: 看（look的过去式）。Directed one's gaze toward something.

name: roared
trans: 咆哮。Made a loud, deep sound like a lion.

name: found
trans: 发现（find的过去式）。Discovered something.

name: zoomed
trans: 快速移动。Moved rapidly with a humming sound.

name: frightened
trans: 受惊的。Feeling sudden fear or alarm.

name: sip
trans: 啜饮。Drink in small quantities.

name: eggs
trans: 鸡蛋。Oval reproductive objects laid by birds.

name: dark
trans: 黑暗的。With little or no light.

name: jelly
trans: 果冻。Sweet gelatinous dessert made from fruit juice.

name: baby
trans: 婴儿。Very young human or animal.

name: drink
trans: 喝。Swallow liquid as refreshment.

name: queen
trans: 女王；蜂王。Female ruler or reproductive female in a colony.

name: tunnel
trans: 隧道。Underground passage dug through soil.

name: scurry
trans: 急匆匆跑动。Move hurriedly with quick short steps.

name: nibble
trans: 小口咬。Take small bites gently.

name: lay
trans: 放置；产卵。Put something down gently or submit to an action.

name: come
trans: 来。Move toward or arrive at a specified place.

name: down
trans: 向下。Toward a lower position or level.

name: more
trans: 更多的。A greater quantity or additional amount.

name: hush
trans: 安静。Make someone be quiet or calm.

name: bring
trans: 带来。Take or carry something to a place.

name: slowly
trans: 缓慢地。At a low speed or gradual pace.

name: hurry
trans: 匆忙。Move or act with great haste.

name: royal
trans: 皇室的。Relating to a king or queen.

name: eating
trans: 吃（eat的进行式）。Consuming food.

name: large
trans: 大的。Of considerable size or extent.

name: stare
trans: 凝视。Look fixedly with wide-open eyes.

name: tasty
trans: 美味的。Having a pleasant flavor.

name: splash
trans: 溅起。Cause liquid to scatter in drops.

name: fluffy
trans: 蓬松的。Soft and light in texture.

name: tricked
trans: 欺骗（trick的过去式）。Deceived someone through cunning.

name: seconds
trans: 秒（复数）；第二的。Units of time or following first.

name: wearing
trans: 穿着（wear的进行式）。Having clothes or accessories on the body.

name: moment
trans: 瞬间。A brief period of time.

name: whizzing
trans: 呼啸而过（whiz的进行式）。Move quickly with a buzzing sound.

name: hat
trans: 帽子。A head covering for protection or fashion.

name: mat
trans: 垫子。A flat piece of material used as a floor covering.

name: bed
trans: 床。A piece of furniture for sleeping.

name: sad
trans: 悲伤的。Feeling sorrow or unhappiness.

name: lost
trans: 丢失的（lose的过去式）。Unable to find one's way.

name: shelf
trans: 架子。A flat horizontal surface for storing objects.

name: chairs
trans: 椅子（复数）。Seats with a back and legs.

name: cannot
trans: 不能。Be unable to do something.

name: everywhere
trans: 到处。In all places or locations.

name: refrigerator
trans: 冰箱。An appliance for keeping food cold.
